text: I ain't here for a longtime, I'm here for a good time.
author: George Strait

text: Identity thief is not a joke, Jim! Millions of families suffer every year.
author: Dwight Schrute

text: Slow down your doing fine. You can't be everything you want to be before your time.
author: Billy Joel

text: I don't know if she ever realized the person I most wanted to be was her. Thank you Mom: You are my guidepost for everything.
author: Rory Gilmore

text: Send a prayer down to the broken hearted, let them know it all turns our just fine.
author: Zach Bryan

text: The scary news is, your on your own now. But the cool news is your on your own now.
author: Taylor Swift

text: I wouldn't act so angry all the time, I wouldn't keep it all inside and I'd let you know how much I love you everyday.'
author: Tyler Childers
